problem_names: lemma index_lfp: "lfp f i : L i"

lemma lfp_lowerbound:
  "\<lbrakk> a : L i;  f a \<le> a \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> lfp f i \<le> a"

lemma lfp_greatest:
  "\<lbrakk> a : L i;  \<And>u. \<lbrakk> u : L i; f u \<le> u\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> a \<le> u \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> a \<le> lfp f i"

lemma lfp_unfold: assumes "\<And>x i. f x : L i \<longleftrightarrow> x : L i"
and mono: "mono f" shows "lfp f i = f (lfp f i)"
translations: lemma index_lfp: "lfp f i : L i"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. local.lfp f i \<in> L i
by(auto simp: lfp_def intro: Glb_in_L)

lemma lfp_lowerbound:
  "\<lbrakk> a : L i;  f a \<le> a \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> lfp f i \<le> a"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>a \<in> L i; f a \<le> a\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> local.lfp f i \<le> a
by (auto simp add: lfp_def intro: Glb_lower)

lemma lfp_greatest:
  "\<lbrakk> a : L i;  \<And>u. \<lbrakk> u : L i; f u \<le> u\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> a \<le> u \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> a \<le> lfp f i"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>a \<in> L i;
     \<And>u.
        \<lbrakk>u \<in> L i; f u \<le> u\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> a \<le> u\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> a \<le> local.lfp f i
by (auto simp add: lfp_def intro: Glb_greatest)

lemma lfp_unfold: assumes "\<And>x i. f x : L i \<longleftrightarrow> x : L i"
and mono: "mono f" shows "lfp f i = f (lfp f i)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. local.lfp f i = f (local.lfp f i)
proof-

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. local.lfp f i = f (local.lfp f i)
note assms(1)[simp] index_lfp[simp]

proof (state)
this:
  (f ?x \<in> L ?i) = (?x \<in> L ?i)
  local.lfp ?f ?i \<in> L ?i

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. local.lfp f i = f (local.lfp f i)
have 1: "f (lfp f i) \<le> lfp f i"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. f (local.lfp f i) \<le> local.lfp f i
apply(rule lfp_greatest)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. f (local.lfp f i) \<in> L i
 2. \<And>u.
       \<lbrakk>u \<in> L i; f u \<le> u\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> f (local.lfp f i) \<le> u
apply simp

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>u.
       \<lbrakk>u \<in> L i; f u \<le> u\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> f (local.lfp f i) \<le> u
by (blast intro: lfp_lowerbound monoD[OF mono] order_trans)

proof (state)
this:
  f (local.lfp f i) \<le> local.lfp f i

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. local.lfp f i = f (local.lfp f i)
have "lfp f i \<le> f (lfp f i)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. local.lfp f i \<le> f (local.lfp f i)
by (fastforce intro: 1 monoD[OF mono] lfp_lowerbound)

proof (state)
this:
  local.lfp f i \<le> f (local.lfp f i)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. local.lfp f i = f (local.lfp f i)
with 1

proof (chain)
picking this:
  f (local.lfp f i) \<le> local.lfp f i
  local.lfp f i \<le> f (local.lfp f i)
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  f (local.lfp f i) \<le> local.lfp f i
  local.lfp f i \<le> f (local.lfp f i)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. local.lfp f i = f (local.lfp f i)
by(blast intro: order_antisym)

proof (state)
this:
  local.lfp f i = f (local.lfp f i)

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
end
